CustomField.description: Image corresponding to the status value
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Status,'New') , IMAGE('/resource/1692887792000/Status_New?', 'New error', -1, -1) , IF(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Working') , IMAGE('/resource/1692887889000/Status_Working?', 'Working error', -1, -1) , IF(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Waiting for Client') , IMAGE('/resource/1692887848000/Status_Waiting?', 'Waiting error', -1, -1) , IF(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Waiting for SME') , IMAGE('/resource/1692887872000/Status_WaitingSME?', 'SME error', -1, -1) , IF(ISPICKVAL(Status,'New email') , IMAGE('/resource/1692887836000/Status_NewEmail?', 'New email error', -1, -1) , IF(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed') , IMAGE('/resource/1692887881000/Status_Closed?', 'Closed error', -1, -1) , '' ))))))
CustomField.label: Status
